content.rendered:
Congratulations to the Saratoga Springs High School winter varsity sports teams who were recently recognized by the New York State Public High School Athletic Association (NYSPHSAA) as scholar-athlete teams! To qualify as a scholar-athlete team, a varsity team’s grade point average (GPA) for 75 percent of the roster must be greater than or equal to at least 90 percent. 

Congratulations to the following Scholar-Athlete Teams:

  • Unified Basketball
  • Boys Lacrosse
  • Girls Lacrosse
  • Baseball
  • Softball
  • Flag Football
  • Boys Tennis
  • Girls Outdoor Track
  • Boys Outdoor Track
